item.title: [Python] Draw a knot interactively with Plotly (Python)
item.description: Draw a knot interactively with #Plotly (Python) 1.First of all This time, I will plot a knot in Plotly on a three-dimensional space. I hope it will help you with your learning. You can do something like â†“. See the Pen dyoyxKW by Sota Misawa (@mitawaut) on CodePen. Source (GitHub) 2. Review Make a minimal review of how to draw the knot. Knot (knot) is $S^1$ embedded piecewise linearly in $S^3$.
